resources.string: Write down 5 little notes every evening about what made you happy today.
This app is going to help you with asking you questions about your day and writing it down.
1st question: companionship\n%s, what was the best thing you did today?
2nd question: serendipity\n%s, what made you happy today?
3rd question: pleasure\n%s, what are the nicest talk you had today?
4th question: flow\n%s, what did you really liked today?
5th question:bliss\n%s, what made you smile today?
